package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	// create a slice from an array
	x := [3]string{"A", "B", "Ğ¡"}
	s := x[:] // a slice referencing the storage of x
	// x[1] = "O"
	t := append(s, "D") // append items to slice s
	x[1] = "O"
	fmt.Println("%+v", x)
	fmt.Println("%+v", s)

}
